adjectives.description: ammonoid (comparative more ammonoid, superlative most ammonoid)

entries.meaning: An extinct cephalopod of the subclass Ammonoidea (including ammonites).
examples: Although the extinct externally shelled cephalopods ammonoids have an extensive fossil record, their soft tissues are very poorly known and, like extinct and living nautiloids, they are largely presumed to not have possessed an ink sac.
